message.body: I'm at my first rite aid and no Almay box
Should I reorder the whole box for reset?
Send me a text with store # city & state. I will have the team track it. If a reorder is needed - they will take care of it. Thanks!
Hi, Confirmed - HQs is ordering - you can leave your number with the store and have them call you when it arrives. I would also call them in a week or so.
We set the Almay to plan a gram and filled empty space with graphics store said they would finish when fixtures came in
this includes tagging inside and price changes outside except for new lip
